RatingRequestBatchJob.name: RatingRequestBatchJob
RatingRequestBatchJob.description: Represents a junction between the rating request and batch job objects.

BatchJobId.description: ID of the batch job that triggered the rating request on the aggregated records.

ErrorCode.description: Error code that defines the batch job failure.

ErrorMessage.description: Error message that describes the cause of the batch job failure.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Name of the rating request batch job record.

RatingRequestId.description: ID of the rating request record associated with the batch job.
